os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)

name: Media Layer AI
short_description:
MediaLayerAI is a media organizer/player like MythTV and Boxee. It features a simple UI which is easy to operate via a remote and a library of modules to provide metadata for existing files.

Our alpha version is now at version 0.77 and will likely move to 0.78 soon.  This will represent the last alpha release. As all of our attention will move to getting 1.0 ready for release.  Here are some of it's exciting features:

-Streaming support: Youtube, Crunchyroll, Dailymotion and more...
-Support for OpenVG, SDL and wxwindows.   
-Support for keyboard, joystick and mouse 
-New config file structure
-No longer dependent on python Shelf or SqLite for metadata.  Everything is XML

Our goal for this version is to re-architect and polish the 0.7x code and create a package that can be run easily and stably on Windows, OSX and Linux - specifically targeting devices like the Blackberry Pi
